data.name: Abomiracers
data.detailed_description:
Abomiracers is a multiplayer King-Of-Hill party game for up to 8 players. You assemble your character from different body parts made from clay and fight your way to victory!



â€¢ Build absolutely crazy characters. Attach anything to anything: sharkosaurus, broccocopter, zombiecentaurus â€“ itâ€™s up to you to create your own avatar.
â€¢ Unique character creation system: Each limb changes the way you move and fight. You can punch out limbs from your enemies, pick it to retain their abilities and recreate your avatar right in the game.
â€¢ Crazy levels: Avoid traps and collect power ups in real world-like levels. To become the King-Of-Hill try to outrace your opponents and be the first on the top.
â€¢ Co-op or Free-For-All: Team up with your friends and fight with your enemies online. Or be friends with no one in ruthless free for all fights!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
